name: The Suite-est Escape
short_description: An island escape, a suite by the ocean, amazing meals. These are the makings of the ultimate vacation.
short_description_detail_page: An island escape to a suite by the ocean is the key to the ultimate vacation! Wait no longer. Book now and receive $50 food & beverage credit per night at Yellowfin Bar & Grill.
description:
BOOK THIS OFFER AND ENJOY :

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations in 1- or 2-bedroom suites
  • $50/night food and beverage credit at Yellowfin Bar & Grill
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, or bicycle rental
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (downtown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions: This package is valid for 1- or 2-bedroom suite accommodations. Daily food and beverage credit is received per reservation and to be used daily at Yellowfin Bar & Grill. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. on-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
